name: Billy's Pod
description:
Billy's Pod is a game made during the Global Game Jam 2021.  You play as Billy, an astronaut whom ship was destroyed in space. You must follow the instructions given and place the beacons in the right places to find the emergency pod to escape. (Playable with keyboard or Xbox controller) 

Controls : Move - ZQSD or Arrows . Drop or Take Beacon / Enter the emergency pod - Space. Pause menu - Escape
